extendedInfo.description: Do you feel like you have been paying far too much money for your (international) calls and SMS messages? Recent studies have shown as many as 80% of people worldwide are paying too much for their calls and text messages simply because they are not paying the most appropriate tariff.The CallTariff App can help you find the best possible deal for your favorite destinations by comparing the rates of all voip providers. Our free service is continuously updated and includes all of the available VoIP providers and their tariffs. In a few easy steps, CallTariff provides you with a clear picture of how much you could save on your calls.Our CallTariff calculator shows you how little you need to spend for your calls and provides the five most favorable options at hand. In addition, there is an overview of all the tariffs (landlines, mobiles, SMS) offered by all VoIP providers for your selected destination.With households capable of saving as much as 90% per year from their bills, and with more and more cheap alternatives for regular telecom providers available, why not to take a few minutes to compare VoIP providers?Use the CallTariff App to find the cheapest calling options available for any destination you like and get the most out of your money.â¢              Find the latest tariffs for your favorite destinationâ¢              Discover great ways to save moneyâ¢              Create your own combination of destinations and see which brand offers the lowest rateâ¢              Calculate the best options by entering the minutes and the amount of SMS you want to useâ¢              Choose up to five different destinations

reviews.title: Helpful app
reviews.comment: Find best calling rate in few taps.
reviews.author: Arif Ullah Khan
